channel.title: Need help to modifie this code [pi]

item.title: Need help to modifie this code [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

Hey id like to modifie this code so it can open a door whit a brass key…

if(!c.hasHammer() && c.absX != 2850) { c.sendMessage("You need to have a hammer to enter here!"); return; } if(c.absY == 5333 && c.absX == 2851 && c.heightLevel == 2 && c.hasHammer()) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2850, 5333, 2); c.sendMessage("Your hammer breaks when you bang on the gigantic door!"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the bandos room!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(2347, 1); } else if (c.absY == 5333 && c.absX == 2850 && c.heightLevel == 2) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2851, 5333, 2); } break;

thats the original code from godwars…

if(c.absY == 9599 && c.absX == 2836 && c.heightLevel == 0 && c.hasbrasskey()) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2836, 9600, 0); c.sendMessage("Your brass crumbles to dust when you open the door!"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Elvarg lair!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(893, 1); } else if (c.absY == 5333 && c.absX == 2850 && c.heightLevel == 0) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2836, 9599, 0); } break;

AFTER COMPILING:

source\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:3231: error: cannot find symbol if(c.absY == 9599 && c.absX == 2836 && c.heightLevel == 0 && c.ha sbrasskey()) { ^ symbol: method hasbrasskey() location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
please tell me if something is wrong… thanks soo much

Read full topic
